name: Ultimate Swim With Dolphin & Dunn River Combo
description: Treat yourself to the “Experience of a Lifetime,” as you frolic with beautiful bottlenose dolphins in the deep waters of a gorgeous, natural lagoon. Feel the thrill as these majestic mammals pull you along by their dorsal fins or give you a foot-push through the crystal-clear Caribbean Sea. After this invigorating encounter, spend the day at the park and enjoy a variety of experiences including watching the dolphins at play or interacting with gentle stingrays, viewing the exciting Shark Show, and marvelling at colorful birds, exotic snakes and iguanas as you make your way along the nature trail. Enjoy an endless array of water-based activities like unlimited mini-boat rides and glass-bottom kayaking. Ahoy Matey! Have a swashbuckling good time while you shop for hidden treasures in “Little Port Royal,” a colorful Pirate’s Village, where buccaneers roam. Top it all off by relaxing on a chaise lounge set directly on the pearly-white sand beach. The highlight stop is Dunn’s River Falls where you'll experience the majesty of one of Jamaica’s most magnificent natural treasures. Led by expert guides, you’ll join hands to form a human chain, as you wind your way up the rocky slopes of this 600 foot waterfall. Pose for snapshots amidst the luxuriant foliage that lines the sides of the ascending falls. Cascading down from its untainted source high in the mountains, you’ll delight in the refreshing, pure water of this natural wonder.
